com.ibasco.agql.core.util

Interface ManagedResource<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The underlying type of the managed resource
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractManagedResource, AgqlManagedExecutorService

    public interface ManagedResource<T>
extends Closeable
    A reference counted resource that will be automatically closed once the count reaches zero. Particularly useful in cases where we provide a static global resource shared across all clients.
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

      • release

        static int release(Object resource)
        Utility function for releasing ManagedResource type instances. If the instance is not a ManagedResource the function will simply return.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to release
        Returns:
        The updated reference count

      • release

        static int release(Object resource,
                   int releaseCount)
        Utility function for releasing ManagedResource type instances. If the instance is not a ManagedResource the function will simply return.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to release
        releaseCount - a int
        Returns:
        The updated reference count
